thought: To craft a honey bottle, I first need to craft a glass bottle. Glass bottles require 3 glass. To craft glass, I need to smelt sand in a furnace. Therefore, I will smelt the sand from slot 36 to a free slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 36 to slot 12 with quantity 1
